column2: "Oh, hey, thanks. I probably could have brought one back faster, butâ€¦"
"Oh. My. God. That was epic! I was really having a hard time because I couldn't find it no matter where I looked."
"I hope you don't mind me taking the credit for this after you went through all that trouble, but hey! That's just how things go, right?"
"Anyway, thanks a million, friend! This is gonna make me look real good!"
